SEARCH
Package com.paigegoldhagen.starbower

Interface ComponentHandler

All Superinterfaces:
LayoutHandler, QueryExecutor, QueryHandler
All Known Implementing Classes:
FestivalComponents, GUI
public interface ComponentHandler extends LayoutHandler, QueryHandler
Interface handling the creation and layout of GUI components.

  • Method Details

    • addFrameListener

      static void addFrameListener(Connection databaseConnection, Queries sqlQueries, Preferences windowsRegistry, JFrame frame)
      Add a listener to the frame to backup the NotifyState table preferences to the Windows Registry when the frame window is in the process of closing.
      Parameters:
      databaseConnection - the connection to the Starbower relational database
      sqlQueries - a class for retrieving SQL query strings
      windowsRegistry - the user preferences for Starbower in the Windows Registry
      frame - the visual window for GUI components

    • getDropdownPanel

      static JPanel getDropdownPanel(List<JComponent> dropdownComponentList)
      Set the Dropdown panel layout and add the dropdown components to the panel.
      Parameters:
      dropdownComponentList - a list of JLabels and a dropdown selection box
      Returns:
      a panel populated with the dropdown components

    • addDropdownPanelsToTopPanel

      static void addDropdownPanelsToTopPanel(JPanel topPanel, List<JPanel> dropdownPanelList)
      Set the Dropdown panel layout and add the panels to the top panel. Update the Dropdown panel layout for each panel added.
      Parameters:
      topPanel - the panel to add the dropdown panels
      dropdownPanelList - a list of JPanels containing JLabels and a dropdown selection box

    • populateTabbedPane

      static void populateTabbedPane(Connection databaseConnection, Queries sqlQueries, JFrame frame, JTabbedPane tabbedPane) throws SQLException
      Get a list of all Expansions and create an expansion panel using the Expansion ID. Create a scroll pane with the expansion panel and add the scroll pane to the tabbed pane. Add a listener to the tabbed pane.
      Parameters:
      databaseConnection - the connection to the Starbower relational database
      sqlQueries - a class for retrieving SQL query strings
      frame - the visual window for GUI components
      tabbedPane - a collection of scroll pane components separated by tabs
      Throws:
      SQLException - the database could not be accessed or the table/column/row could not be found

    • setFrameFocus

      static void setFrameFocus(JTabbedPane tabbedPane)
      Once all GUI components have loaded and/or finished processing tasks, request focus in the frame for the tabbed pane.
      Parameters:
      tabbedPane - the tabbed pane to focus

    • createCategoryCheckbox

      static JCheckBox createCategoryCheckbox(String categoryName, Integer categoryNotifyStateID, Boolean categoryNotifyStateEnabled)
      Create a Category checkbox with the Category name as the text and the NotifyState enabled boolean as the selected state. Set the checkbox name as the NotifyState ID and define the FlatLaf style class of the checkbox.
      Parameters:
      categoryName - the Category name string
      categoryNotifyStateID - the NotifyState ID
      categoryNotifyStateEnabled - the NotifyState enabled boolean
      Returns:
      a populated Category checkbox

    • addCategoryLabel

      static void addCategoryLabel(JPanel categoryPanel, GridBagConstraints layout, Integer rowCount, String categoryName)
      Set the Category label layout, create a Category label using the Category name, and add the label to the Category panel.
      Parameters:
      categoryPanel - the panel to add the Category label
      layout - a class for setting visual constraints for GUI components
      rowCount - the current row within the layout
      categoryName - the Category name string

    • addSeparator

      static void addSeparator(JPanel categoryPanel, GridBagConstraints layout, Integer rowCount)
      Set the separator layout and add a new separator to the Category panel.
      Parameters:
      categoryPanel - the panel to add the separator component
      layout - a class for setting visual constraints for GUI components
      rowCount - the current row within the layout

    • addDynamicEventCheckbox

      static void addDynamicEventCheckbox(JPanel categoryPanel, List<JCheckBox> checkboxList, GridBagConstraints layout, Integer rowCount, String dynamicEventName, Integer dynamicEventNotifyStateID, Boolean dynamicEventNotifyStateEnabled)
      Create a DynamicEvent checkbox using the DynamicEvent name, NotifyState ID, and NotifyState enabled boolean. Set the DynamicEvent checkbox layout and add the checkbox to the checkbox list and Category panel.
      Parameters:
      categoryPanel - the panel to add the DynamicEvent checkbox
      checkboxList - a list to add all created checkboxes
      layout - a class for setting visual constraints for GUI components
      rowCount - the current row within the layout
      dynamicEventName - the DynamicEvent name string
      dynamicEventNotifyStateID - the NotifyState ID
      dynamicEventNotifyStateEnabled - the NotifyState enabled boolean

    • addLocationButton

      static void addLocationButton(JFrame frame, JPanel categoryPanel, GridBagConstraints layout, Integer startRow, String dynamicEventLocation, String waypointLink, String tooltipText)
      Create a location button using the DynamicEvent location, waypoint link, and tooltip text. Add listeners to the button, set the button layout, and add the button to the Category panel.
      Parameters:
      frame - the visual window for GUI components
      categoryPanel - the panel to add the button
      layout - a class for setting visual constraints for GUI components
      startRow - the starting row within the layout
      dynamicEventLocation - the Map name or Waypoint name string
      waypointLink - the Waypoint chat link string
      tooltipText - the tooltip text string for the button

    • setCategoryPanelLayout

      static void setCategoryPanelLayout(GridBagConstraints layout)
      Set the Category panel layout using the LayoutHandler interface.
      Parameters:
      layout - a class for setting visual constraints for GUI components

    • addCountdownLabel

      static void addCountdownLabel(JPanel countdownPanel, GridBagConstraints layout, Integer rowCount, String countdownString)
      Create a countdown label with the countdown string as the label text, set the countdown label layout, and add the label to the countdown panel.
      Parameters:
      countdownPanel - the panel to add the countdown label
      layout - a class for setting visual constraints for GUI components
      rowCount - the current row within the layout
      countdownString - a string with the amount of time until a certain date

    • updateCategoryPanelLayout

      static void updateCategoryPanelLayout(GridBagConstraints layout)
      Update the Category panel layout using the LayoutHandler interface.
      Parameters:
      layout - a class for setting visual constraints for GUI components

    • addFestivalCategoryCheckbox

      static void addFestivalCategoryCheckbox(JPanel festivalPanel, List<JCheckBox> checkboxList, GridBagConstraints layout, Integer rowCount, JCheckBox categoryCheckbox)
      Set the Category checkbox layout and update the Y spacing for the layout. Add the Category checkbox to the checkbox list and the Festival panel.
      Parameters:
      festivalPanel - the panel to add the Category checkbox
      checkboxList - a list to add all created checkboxes
      layout - a class for setting visual constraints for GUI components
      rowCount - the current row within the layout
      categoryCheckbox - a populated Festival Category checkbox

    • addCheckboxListeners

      static void addCheckboxListeners(Connection databaseConnection, Queries sqlQueries, List<JCheckBox> checkboxList)
      Add checkbox listeners for the Checkbox list using the CheckboxHandler.
      Parameters:
      databaseConnection - the connection to the Starbower relational database
      sqlQueries - a class for retrieving SQL query strings
      checkboxList - a list of all JCheckbox components displayed on the GUI

    • newPanel

      static JPanel newPanel()
      Create a new panel with a GridBagLayout manager.
      Returns:
      a panel with a specific layout manager

    • addComponentsToFrame

      static void addComponentsToFrame(JFrame frame, JPanel dropdownPanel, JTabbedPane tabbedPane)
      Initialise the frame layout and add the dropdown panel to the frame. Update the frame layout and add the tabbed pane to the frame.
      Parameters:
      frame - the visual window for GUI components
      dropdownPanel - the populated dropdown panel
      tabbedPane - the tabbed pane with populated scroll panes and tabs
